title: Bug in loot store please refund me
body: On the loot store i clicked on unlock permanently and it selected the rent for 7 days, this was on workshop shaco skin, please may you return the skin shard so i can unlock it permanently as i did not click this. thankyou

replies.body: Anytime you click on those hextech shards and then choose an option from that list, another window will open to the left asking you to confirm your choice before it uses up the shard. Because there are so many confirmation steps, we won't be able to refund any shards used as a rental.
i sent a bug about this but got no response and it's been 2 days
